SEARCH
Module test_ui1
Package PlayerGameManager

Class SpyBotPlayerGameManager

java.lang.Object
PlayerGameManager.SpyBotPlayerGameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerGameManager
public class SpyBotPlayerGameManager extends Object implements PlayerGameManager
Manages game logic and interactions for a spy bot player in a political simulation game. This class implements the PlayerGameManager interface to handle player decisions, such as voting and role assignments, based on calculated spy chances.
